actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an exemption of the first $7,500 of income received by a taxpayer who is 65 years of age or older.

summary.text: Permits, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, an exemption of the first $7,500 of income received by a taxpayer who is 65 years of age or older. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an exemption of the first $7,500 of income received by a taxpayer who is 65 years of age or older.
